problem.markdown:
Which is not a potential example where you would need to use a predictor to calculate?
>>Select the most appropriate choice: (2 attempts)<<
( ) A. Average Malaria incidence over the last 6 months. (x) B. Sum all malaria positive cases to national level in a single month. ( ) C. If this value is 0 then count 1 – Count the number of facilities that reported some value. ( ) D. Average ANC 1 Visits with 3 standard deviations for the last 12 months – ANC 1 Outlier Threshold.
[explanation] Sum all malaria positive cases to national level in a single month is correct. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.p: Which is not a potential example where you would need to use a predictor to calculate?
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Select the most appropriate choice: (2 attempts)

choicegroup.choice: A. Average Malaria incidence over the last 6 months.
B. Sum all malaria positive cases to national level in a single month.
C. If this value is 0 then count 1 – Count the number of facilities that reported some value.
D. Average ANC 1 Visits with 3 standard deviations for the last 12 months – ANC 1 Outlier Threshold.

div.p: Sum all malaria positive cases to national level in a single month is correct.
